verses.verse: שָׁמוֹר֙ <WH8104> Observe אֶת־ <WH853> חֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH2320> the month הָאָבִ֔יב <WH24> of Abib וְעָשִׂ֣יתָ <WH6213> and keep פֶּ֔סַח <WH6453> the passover לַיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> unto the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֑יךָ <WH430> thy God כִּ֞י <WH3588> in בְּחֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH2320> for in the month הָֽאָבִ֗יב <WH24> of Abib הוֹצִ֨יאֲךָ֜ <WH3318> brought thee forth יְהוָ֧ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֛יךָ <WH430> thy God מִמִּצְרַ֖יִם <WH4714> out of Egypt לָֽיְלָה׃ <WH3915> by night

וְזָבַ֥חְתָּ <WH2076> Thou shalt therefore sacrifice פֶּ֛סַח <WH6453> the passover לַיהוָ֥ה <WH3068> unto the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <WH430> thy God צֹ֣אן <WH6629> of the flock וּבָקָ֑ר <WH1241> and the herd בַּמָּקוֹם֙ <WH4725> in the place אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after יִבְחַ֣ר <WH977> shall choose יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> which the LORD לְשַׁכֵּ֥ן <WH7931> to place שְׁמ֖וֹ <WH8034> his name שָֽׁם׃ <WH8033> in it

לֹא־ <WH3808> shall not תֹאכַ֤ל <WH398> Thou shalt eat עָלָיו֙ <WH5921> and חָמֵ֔ץ <WH2557> no leavened bread שִׁבְעַ֥ת <WH7651> with it seven יָמִ֛ים <WH3117> days תֹּֽאכַל־ <WH398> shalt thou eat עָלָ֥יו <WH5921> with מַצּ֖וֹת <WH4682> unleavened bread לֶ֣חֶם <WH3899> therewith [even] the bread עֹ֑נִי <WH6040> of affliction כִּ֣י <WH3588> in בְחִפָּז֗וֹן <WH2649> in haste יָצָ֙אתָ֙ <WH3318> for thou camest forth מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> out of the land מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> of Egypt לְמַ֣עַן <WH4616> that תִּזְכֹּ֗ר <WH2142> that thou mayest remember אֶת־ <WH853> י֤וֹם <WH3117> the day צֵֽאתְךָ֙ <WH3318> when thou camest forth מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> out of the land מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> of Egypt כֹּ֖ל <WH3605> all יְמֵ֥י <WH3117> all the days חַיֶּֽיךָ׃ <WH2416> of thy life

וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> no יֵרָאֶ֨ה <WH7200> seen לְךָ֥ שְׂאֹ֛ר <WH7603> And there shall be no leavened bread בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all גְּבֻלְךָ֖ <WH1366> with thee in all thy coast שִׁבְעַ֣ת <WH7651> seven יָמִ֑ים <WH3117> days וְלֹא־ <WH3808> and none יָלִ֣ין <WH3885> remain מִן־ <WH4480> at הַבָּשָׂ֗ר <WH1320> neither shall there [any thing] of the flesh אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which תִּזְבַּ֥ח <WH2076> which thou sacrificedst בָּעֶ֛רֶב <WH6153> at even בַּיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> day הָרִאשׁ֖וֹן <WH7223> the first לַבֹּֽקֶר׃ <WH1242> all night until the morning

לֹ֥א <WH3808> are not תוּכַ֖ל <WH3201> Thou mayest לִזְבֹּ֣חַ <WH2076> not sacrifice אֶת־ <WH853> הַפָּ֑סַח <WH6453> the passover בְּאַחַ֣ד <WH259> within any שְׁעָרֶ֔יךָ <WH8179> of thy gates אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <WH430> thy God נֹתֵ֥ן <WH5414> giveth לָֽךְ׃

כִּ֠י <WH3588> for אִֽם־ <WH518> lo אֶל־ <WH413> about הַמָּק֞וֹם <WH4725> But at the place אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after יִבְחַ֨ר <WH977> shall choose יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH430> thy God לְשַׁכֵּ֣ן <WH7931> to place שְׁמ֔וֹ <WH8034> his name שָׁ֛ם <WH8033> in it תִּזְבַּ֥ח <WH2076> in there thou shalt sacrifice אֶת־ <WH853> הַפֶּ֖סַח <WH6453> the passover בָּעָ֑רֶב <WH6153> at even כְּב֣וֹא <WH935> at the going down הַשֶּׁ֔מֶשׁ <WH8121> of the sun מוֹעֵ֖ד <WH4150> at the season צֵֽאתְךָ֥ <WH3318> that thou camest forth מִמִּצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> out of Egypt

וּבִשַּׁלְתָּ֙ <WH1310> And thou shalt roast וְאָ֣כַלְתָּ֔ <WH398> and eat בַּמָּק֕וֹם <WH4725> [it] in the place אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which יִבְחַ֛ר <WH977> shall choose יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <WH430> thy God בּ֑וֹ וּפָנִ֣יתָ <WH6437> and thou shalt turn בַבֹּ֔קֶר <WH1242> in the morning וְהָלַכְתָּ֖ <WH1980> and go לְאֹהָלֶֽיךָ׃ <WH168> unto thy tents

שֵׁ֥שֶׁת <WH8337> Six יָמִ֖ים <WH3117> days תֹּאכַ֣ל <WH398> thou shalt eat מַצּ֑וֹת <WH4682> unleavened bread וּבַיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> day הַשְּׁבִיעִ֗י <WH7637> and on the seventh עֲצֶ֙רֶת֙ <WH6116> [shall be] a solemn assembly לַיהוָ֣ה <WH3068> to the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <WH430> thy God לֹ֥א <WH3808> no תַעֲשֶׂ֖ה <WH6213> thou shalt do מְלָאכָֽה׃ <WH4399> no work ס

שִׁבְעָ֥ה <WH7651> Seven שָׁבֻעֹ֖ת <WH7620> weeks תִּסְפָּר־ <WH5608> shalt thou number לָ֑ךְ מֵהָחֵ֤ל <WH2490> unto thee begin חֶרְמֵשׁ֙ <WH2770> [to put] the sickle בַּקָּמָ֔ה <WH7054> to the corn תָּחֵ֣ל <WH2490> from [such time as] thou beginnest לִסְפֹּ֔ר <WH5608> to number שִׁבְעָ֖ה <WH7651> the seven שָׁבֻעֽוֹת׃ <WH7620> weeks

וְעָשִׂ֜יתָ <WH6213> And thou shalt keep חַ֤ג <WH2282> the feast שָׁבֻעוֹת֙ <WH7620> of weeks לַיהוָ֣ה <WH3068> unto the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <WH430> thy God מִסַּ֛ת <WH4530> with a tribute נִדְבַ֥ת <WH5071> of a freewill offering יָדְךָ֖ <WH3027> of thine hand אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which תִּתֵּ֑ן <WH5414> which thou shalt give כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which יְבָרֶכְךָ֖ <WH1288> hath blessed יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> [unto the LORD thy God] according as the LORD אֱלֹהֶֽיךָ׃ <WH430> thy God

וְשָׂמַחְתָּ֞ <WH8055> And thou shalt rejoice לִפְנֵ֣י ׀ <WH6440> before יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֗יךָ <WH430> thy God אַתָּ֨ה <WH859> you וּבִנְךָ֣ <WH1121> thou and thy son וּבִתֶּךָ֮ <WH1323> and thy daughter וְעַבְדְּךָ֣ <WH5650> and thy manservant וַאֲמָתֶךָ֒ <WH519> and thy maidservant וְהַלֵּוִי֙ <WH3881> and the Levite אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who בִּשְׁעָרֶ֔יךָ <WH8179> that [is] within thy gates וְהַגֵּ֛ר <WH1616> and the stranger וְהַיָּת֥וֹם <WH3490> and the fatherless וְהָאַלְמָנָ֖ה <WH490> and the widow אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who בְּקִרְבֶּ֑ךָ <WH7130> that [are] among בַּמָּק֗וֹם <WH4725> you in the place אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> who יִבְחַר֙ <WH977> hath chosen יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <WH430> thy God לְשַׁכֵּ֥ן <WH7931> to place שְׁמ֖וֹ <WH8034> his name שָֽׁם׃ <WH8033> in it

וְזָ֣כַרְתָּ֔ <WH2142> And thou shalt remember כִּי־ <WH3588> for עֶ֥בֶד <WH5650> that thou wast a bondman הָיִ֖יתָ <WH1961> become בְּמִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> in Egypt וְשָׁמַרְתָּ֣ <WH8104> and thou shalt observe וְעָשִׂ֔יתָ <WH6213> and do אֶת־ <WH853> הַֽחֻקִּ֖ים <WH2706> these statutes הָאֵֽלֶּה׃ <WH428> these פ

חַ֧ג <WH2282> the feast הַסֻּכֹּ֛ת <WH5521> of tabernacles תַּעֲשֶׂ֥ה <WH6213> Thou shalt observe לְךָ֖ שִׁבְעַ֣ת <WH7651> seven יָמִ֑ים <WH3117> days בְּאָ֨סְפְּךָ֔ <WH622> after that thou hast gathered מִֽגָּרְנְךָ֖ <WH1637> in thy corn וּמִיִּקְבֶֽךָ׃ <WH3342> and thy wine

וְשָׂמַחְתָּ֖ <WH8055> And thou shalt rejoice בְּחַגֶּ֑ךָ <WH2282> in thy feast אַתָּ֨ה <WH859> you וּבִנְךָ֤ <WH1121> thou and thy son וּבִתֶּ֙ךָ֙ <WH1323> and thy daughter וְעַבְדְּךָ֣ <WH5650> and thy manservant וַאֲמָתֶ֔ךָ <WH519> and thy maidservant וְהַלֵּוִ֗י <WH3881> and the Levite וְהַגֵּ֛ר <WH1616> the stranger וְהַיָּת֥וֹם <WH3490> and the fatherless וְהָאַלְמָנָ֖ה <WH490> and the widow אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who בִּשְׁעָרֶֽיךָ׃ <WH8179> that [are] within thy gates

שִׁבְעַ֣ת <WH7651> Seven יָמִ֗ים <WH3117> days תָּחֹג֙ <WH2287> shalt thou keep a solemn feast לַיהוָ֣ה <WH3068> unto the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <WH430> thy God בַּמָּק֖וֹם <WH4725> in the place אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which יִבְחַ֣ר <WH977> shall choose יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> which the LORD כִּ֣י <WH3588> because יְבָרֶכְךָ֞ <WH1288> shall bless יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> because the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֗יךָ <WH430> thy God בְּכֹ֤ל <WH3605> all תְּבוּאָֽתְךָ֙ <WH8393> thee in all thine increase וּבְכֹל֙ <WH3605> all מַעֲשֵׂ֣ה <WH4639> and in all the works יָדֶ֔יךָ <WH3027> of thine hands וְהָיִ֖יתָ <WH1961> become אַ֥ךְ <WH389> you will be altogether שָׂמֵֽחַ׃ <WH8056> therefore thou shalt surely rejoice

שָׁל֣וֹשׁ <WH7969> Three פְּעָמִ֣ים ׀ <WH6471> times בַּשָּׁנָ֡ה <WH8141> in a year יֵרָאֶ֨ה <WH7200> appear כָל־ <WH3605> all זְכוּרְךָ֜ <WH2138> shall all thy males אֶת־ <WH853> פְּנֵ֣י ׀ <WH6440> before יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֗יךָ <WH430> thy God בַּמָּקוֹם֙ <WH4725> in the place אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which יִבְחָ֔ר <WH977> which he shall choose בְּחַ֧ג <WH2282> in the feast הַמַּצּ֛וֹת <WH4682> of unleavened bread וּבְחַ֥ג <WH2282> and in the feast הַשָּׁבֻע֖וֹת <WH7620> of weeks וּבְחַ֣ג <WH2282> and in the feast הַסֻּכּ֑וֹת <WH5521> of tabernacles וְלֹ֧א <WH3808> shall not יֵרָאֶ֛ה <WH7200> and they shall not appear אֶת־ <WH853> פְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> before יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> the LORD רֵיקָֽם׃ <WH7387> empty

אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> Every man כְּמַתְּנַ֣ת <WH4979> shall give יָד֑וֹ <WH3027> is able כְּבִרְכַּ֛ת <WH1293> according to the blessing יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <WH430> thy God אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which נָֽתַן־ <WH5414> which he hath given לָֽךְ׃ ס

שֹׁפְטִ֣ים <WH8199> Judges וְשֹֽׁטְרִ֗ים <WH7860> and officers תִּֽתֶּן־ <WH5414> shalt thou make לְךָ֙ בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all שְׁעָרֶ֔יךָ <WH8179> thee in all thy gates אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which יְהוָ֧ה <WH3068> which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֛יךָ <WH430> thy God נֹתֵ֥ן <WH5414> giveth לְךָ֖ לִשְׁבָטֶ֑יךָ <WH7626> thee throughout thy tribes וְשָׁפְט֥וּ <WH8199> and they shall judge אֶת־ <WH853> הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> the people מִשְׁפַּט־ <WH4941> judgment צֶֽדֶק׃ <WH6664> with just

לֹא־ <WH3808> shall not תַטֶּ֣ה <WH5186> Thou shalt not wrest מִשְׁפָּ֔ט <WH4941> judgment לֹ֥א <WH3808> not תַכִּ֖יר <WH5234> thou shalt not respect פָּנִ֑ים <WH6440> persons וְלֹא־ <WH3808> shall not תִקַּ֣ח <WH3947> neither take שֹׁ֔חַד <WH7810> a gift כִּ֣י <WH3588> for הַשֹּׁ֗חַד <WH7810> for a gift יְעַוֵּר֙ <WH5786> doth blind עֵינֵ֣י <WH5869> the eyes חֲכָמִ֔ים <WH2450> of the wise וִֽיסַלֵּ֖ף <WH5557> and pervert דִּבְרֵ֥י <WH1697> the words צַדִּיקִֽם׃ <WH6662> of the righteous

צֶ֥דֶק <WH6664> That which is altogether צֶ֖דֶק <WH6664> just תִּרְדֹּ֑ף <WH7291> shalt thou follow לְמַ֤עַן <WH4616> that תִּֽחְיֶה֙ <WH2421> that thou mayest live וְיָרַשְׁתָּ֣ <WH3423> and inherit אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> the land אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <WH430> thy God נֹתֵ֥ן <WH5414> giveth לָֽךְ׃ ס

לֹֽא־ <WH3808> shall not תִטַּ֥ע <WH5193> Thou shalt not plant לְךָ֛ אֲשֵׁרָ֖ה <WH842> thee a grove כָּל־ <WH3605> of any עֵ֑ץ <WH6086> of any trees אֵ֗צֶל <WH681> near unto מִזְבַּ֛ח <WH4196> the altar יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <WH430> thy God אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which תַּעֲשֶׂה־ <WH6213> which thou shalt make לָּֽךְ׃ ס

וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> shall not תָקִ֥ים <WH6965> Neither shalt thou set thee up לְךָ֖ מַצֵּבָ֑ה <WH4676> [any] image אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which שָׂנֵ֖א <WH8130> hateth יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> which the LORD אֱלֹהֶֽיךָ׃ <WH430> thy God ס
